Texts.Chs: 真就是比蜡像水果进步很多。
Texts.Eng: A step up from wax fruit bowls for sure.

Texts.Chs: 任何称职的鲛人厨师都知道，烹饪技巧让高质量膳食事半功倍。
Texts.Eng: Any Hylotl chef worth their salt knows presentation is half of any quality meal.

Texts.Chs: 在猿人星区，食物是一种人造稀缺资源。我不确定只是轻率地展示食物是否让能我感到舒服。
Texts.Eng: Food in Apex territory is an artificially scarce resource. I'm not sure I'm comfortable just flippantly displaying it.

Texts.Chs: 食物用来展示？真是浪费...
Texts.Eng: Food just for showing off? What a waste...

Texts.Chs: 用家常菜制作装饰物品！
Texts.Eng: Make decorative objects out of home cooked meals!

Texts.Chs: 展展展示食物真是浪费，好吃的就应该被吃掉！
Texts.Eng: SSShowing off food is wasteful. Food is for eating!

Texts.Chs: 摆盘食物的气味是如此诱人，我担心我不会用它来装饰很长一段时间。
Texts.Eng: The smell of plated food is so tempting, I fear I won't have it to decorate with for long.

Texts.Chs: 为什么会有人会展示然后浪费食物呢？这些食物不会变质吗？
Texts.Eng: Why would one waste food by just displaying it? Won't it spoil?
